summary: A Remake of the Character Riddick, (Vin Diesel) as simple as that. I\'ve not Started on the Char, just to be done with the First Quest, And I am right outside of the Cave.
descriptionHtml:
A Remake of the Character Riddick, (Vin Diesel) as simple as that. I\'ve not Started on the Char, just to be done with the First Quest, And I am right outside of the Cave.
The character is named Riddick, It is a NORD, and i my Opinion Looks like Riddick.

He does not have Hair in the face, but I do Not Know how I can remove the Facial hair on his Chest, If I knew, I would\'ve done it, I just made this to have something to do, not to make it perfect. Just a little look\'a\'like. Thanks. But Seriously, thanks for the Comments, I need them if I\'m gonna make more. I need Feedback ;-)

 and again! Thanks for Downloading! I hope you like it :-)
- MoneyLover
author: Bethesda or Me MoneyLover
